Deemos was glad he was in the Alliance, he could do whatever he 
wanted, more so than before, even, and nobody could stand in his way, 
especially now that the Alliance were moving into a new base, but he 
was still intrigued, was this big move going to help them THAT much? 
The Mafia came to the planet on a ship with unbelievable power, and 
it was destroyed because of a virus that kept the ship's final bit of 
fuel from working, could the same thing possibly happen to the 
Alliance's new base? No, they would assuredly have someone to work on 
the computer, it wouldn't happen, but just to make sure, Deemos could 
offer one of his computer workers, it could do nothing but help.

Cut to Serge, finally digging up the battered and bruised Grenade and 
Kracken, and called Deemos. Deemos sent coordinates through commlink 
to Serge and Serge started to travel, heading in the direction they 
were traveling almost, that way he could get to the Alliance base 
even as it moves, he takes Grenade, Kracken, unconcious and also 
Beholder's pieces, and heads to the Alliance base...
